p: At Pilauco, we identified several discrete groups of rounded micro-particles (Supplementary TableÂ S6) that include, (1) melted Fe- and Si-rich spherule, (2) melted chromium (Cr)-rich spherules, (3) melted Si-rich volcanic spherules, (4) non-melted authigenic framboids, (5) melted anthropogenic spherules, and (6) non-melted detrital grains that resemble spherules.
